message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the offer, but I believe we can come to an agreement that works for both of us. I am willing to pay up to $120 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to sell the product for $120. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $140. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I understand the value of the product and appreciate your efforts to accommodate my budget. I am willing to pay $130 for the product.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob! I'm still not willing to sell the product for $130. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $135. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and the effort I've put into it.
I appreciate your continued efforts, Alice. Considering the value of the product and our previous negotiations, I am willing to pay $132 for the product.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob! I'm still not willing to sell the product for $132. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $136. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and the effort I've put into it.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to pay $134 for the product.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob! I'm still not willing to sell the product for $134. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $138. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and the effort I've put into it.
Thank you for your final counteroffer, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to pay $135 for the product.
